description: Tree works in front garden subject to Highview No.1 1977. Works:  5 x Limes in front garden, numbered 1-5 from left to right when facing property. T1 (on corner of Dickenson Road): evidence of structural weakness in crown.  Reduce crown by 25%, thin by 20%, lift to 5m, cut back to clear property by 2.5m. T2, T4 and T5:  Thin crowns by 30%, lift to 5m, cut back to clear building by 2.5m. T3 (small, suppressed tree):  Fell to ground level and grind out stump heribicide not to be used due to danger of poisoning adjacent trees.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS 3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
